hero.title: Happytel Advantages
hero.subtitle: Share wireless mobile internet with eSIM to other mobile devices easily and quickly
hero.card1_text: Activation in 2 minutes via QR code. No office visits or waiting — connection is available immediately
hero.card2_text: Personal, work, and travel plans — all in one smartphone. Easily switch in a couple of clicks
hero.card3_text: Don’t waste your nerves dealing with various bots or AI. Trust professionals, our team will resolve any connectivity issues instantly!
hero.card4_text: eSIM cannot be lost or damaged. If you lose your phone, the number can be easily transferred to another device
hero.card5_text: Large data packages at affordable prices. No hidden fees, overpayments, or imposed services
hero.card6_text: No plastic SIM cards — less waste and care for the environment
